name: Dueling Game (Longswords)
description:
An Idea that I've worked on intermittently for the past few months between life. 

I've looked at plenty of HEMA websites and videos, tutorials, interpretations, etc. and I've decided to model the German school of fencing first. I will not get it exactly right, and this being a game, simplifications will be called for, but I hope to work around complications to deliver a stylized third-person sword fighting experience that is at least closer to reality than most new melee games, and still easy to understand and satisfying to play.
